v.v: But Israel has rejected what is good,
For this idol came from Israel;
For the people sow the wind
For they went up to Assyria
Even though they have hired lovers among the nations,
For Ephraim has multiplied altars for sin offerings,
I could write down my law for them ten thousand times,
As for the sacrifices of my offerings,
Israel has forgotten me, his Maker,

v: An eagle is coming over the house of Yahweh
because the people have broken my covenant
and rebelled against my law.
‘My God, we in Israel know you.’
and the enemy will pursue him.
but not by me.
They have made princes,
but without my knowledge.
With their silver and gold
they have made idols for themselves,
but it was only so they might be cut off.”
My anger is burning against these people.
For how long will they stay guilty?
a workman made it;
it is not God!
The calf of Samaria will be broken to pieces.
and reap the whirlwind.
The standing grain has no heads;
it yields no flour.
If it does come to maturity,
foreigners will devour it.
now they lie among the nations like something useless.
like a wild donkey all alone.
Ephraim has hired lovers for herself.
I will now gather them together.
They will begin to waste away
because of the oppression of the king of princes.
but they have become altars for committing sins instead.
but they would view it as something strange to them.
they sacrifice meat and eat it,
but I, Yahweh, do not accept them.
Now I will think about their iniquity
and punish their sins.
They will return to Egypt.
and has built palaces.
Judah has fortified many cities,
but I will send fire on his cities;
it will destroy his fortresses.
